thread.title: Good hotel for its price
thread.title_full: Good hotel for its price - Review of Days Hotel London- Waterloo, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: zsuzsamaga
title: Good hotel for its price
text: Good hotel for its price. Location is good, takes only 17 minutes walking to the Big Ben. Although the cup was not particularly clean, the rest was much cleaner. You even get a water kettle in the room, with some instant coffee and tee bags for free. The bed is too soft but putting the mattress on the floor can improve the situation a lot. Although the double room is quite big, storage place is a bit limited, the room could have at least a big wardrobe for the clothes.
